## IMathBar.Position property

Position of the bar line. Default: Top

```csharp
public MathTopBotPositions Position { get; set; }
```

### Examples

Example:

```csharp
[C#]
IMathBar mathBar = new MathBar(new MathematicalText("x"));
mathBar.Position = MathTopBotPositions.Bottom;
```
